CustomField.description: Optional shipping state for the item's ordered on the receipt line. If left blank, the value of this field will be updated with the value of the parent receipt's "Shipping State" field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Optional shipping state for the item's ordered on the receipt line. If left blank, the value of this field will be updated with the value of the parent receipt's "Shipping State" field.
CustomField.label: Shipping State
